member.name: M:LabProg2019.Gfx.raster.unsafe_blit(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,LabProg2019.Gfx.wronly_raster,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Blit a rectangular region of pixels from this object as source to the destination raster. Expression src.unsafe_blit (x0, y0, w, h, dst, x1, y1) blits from source raster src to destination raster dst, copying the rectangular region with top-left corner at (x0, y0) and bottom-right corner at (x0 + w - 1, y0 + h -1) to destination coordinates (x1, y1).
